name: Stickman Prison Escape Sim
description:
You have been sentenced to death for a crime,but you did not commit.Now you want to escape the prison and prove your innocence.You are framed into the jail!!!!
Try and watch everything,use your keen powers of observation and wisdom to help him escape from prison,
Make the right choices at right moment to escape,or choose the wrong options that leads to a FAIL ending.
The ultimate goal is to escape the prison.so help the stickman to realize his wish.Much fun.
